          <title>
            <string language="en">A cell in circuit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Zelle im Stromkreis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une cellule dans le circuit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma pilha no circuito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una cellula in circuito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα κύτταρο στο κύκλωμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una célula en circuito</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the movement of electrons around a circuit from the positive to the negative terminal of a cell. This kind of current is a scientific convention and is called a conventional current.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">circuits</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">conduction electrons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electric cells</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electric currents</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">flow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">negative terminals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">positive terminals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wires</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Bewegung der Elektronen 
um einen Stromkreis vom Positiv zur Minus-Klemme einer Zelle. 
Diese Art des Stromes ist eine wissenschaftliche Vereinbarung 
und wird einen herkömmlichen Strom benannt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le mouvement des 
électrons autour d'un circuit du positif au terminal négatif d'une 
cellule. Ce genre de courant est une convention scientifique et 
s'appelle un courant conventionnel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o movimento dos elétrons
em torno de um circuito do positivo ao terminal negativo de uma pilha.
Este tipo da corrente é uma convenção científica e é 
chamado uma corrente convencional.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il movimento degli 
elettroni intorno ad un circuito dal positive al terminale negativo di
una cellula. Questo genere di corrente è una convenzione 
scientifica ed è chiamato una corrente convenzionale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τη μετακίνηση των 
ηλεκτρονίων γύρω από ένα κύκλωμα από το θετικό στο αρνητικό 
τερματικό ενός κυττάρου. Αυτό το είδος ρεύματος είναι 
επιστημονική σύμβαση και καλείται συμβατικό ρεύμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el movimiento de 
electrones alrededor de un circuito del positivo a la terminal 
negativa de una célula. Esta clase de corriente es una 
convención científica y se llama una corriente convencional.</string>
          </description>
